abstract: The company had initially planned to split the work between South Carolina and Washington State.
snippet: The company had initially planned to split the work between South Carolina and Washington State.
lead_paragraph: Boeing said on Wednesday that it would assemble the largest of its three 787 Dreamliner jets only in South Carolina, rather than splitting the work with a plant in Washington State as it has for the first two models.

headline.main: Boeing to Build Biggest 787 in the South
headline.print_headline: Boeing to Build Biggest 787 in the South
